--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> 
> > Ragnar: Maybe one of us should go while the other goes on with the
> > salvage. I can go because I am better armed, should she try
> > anything... but, she is welcome as a guest, I think.
> > 
> 
> "Don't worry," she was calm. " I won't try anything. I may be a 
Decepticon, 
> but I am not stupid. Besides, would be foolish of me to try to do 
so." 
> 
> > "Fine.  You two can head back to the base if you want.  I'll see 
if I 
> > can't get this hunk of metal airborn again."  Wheeljack pops open 
a 
> > service panel and starts to work. 
> > 
> 
> She looekd at Ragnar, motioning with her right arm, "Lead the way."

"You kids have fun together, y'hear?"  Jackie's voice is a bit 
muffled, since he's almost literally buried in his self-assigned 
repair job.
